sub_topic: Interpolation and extrapolation of data using Lagrange polynomials
message_1:
Suppose a student has measured the temperature in degrees Celsius of a chemical reaction at different times and wants to estimate the temperature at a specific time using Lagrange polynomial interpolation. The data collected is shown in the table below:



| Time (seconds) | Temperature (°C) |
| ------------- | ---------------- |
| 0             | 25               |
| 10            | 33               |
| 20            | 42               |
| 30            | 54               |
| 40            | 65               |



What is the estimated temperature at time t=15 seconds using Lagrange polynomial interpolation?
